'''Genshin Impact × Xiaomi''' is a collaborative effort between [[Genshin Impact]] creators [[miHoYo]] and the Chinese electronics company {{w|Xiaomi}}.

==Collaborations==
To date, there have been '''2''' collaboration between Genshin Impact and Xiaomi.

===Redmi Airdots 3 Pro (Klee)===
For the global version of this collaboration, please see [[Genshin Impact x POCO]].<br>
This collaboration features a [https://www.mi.com/global/product/redmi-buds-3-pro/ Redmi Airdots 3 Pro] with a custom theme centred around [[Klee]]. The device comes in special packaging with the same theming style.<br>
Other physical accessories include:
* 1x [[Dodoco Tales]] themed carrying case
* 1x "Klee's backpack" holding pouch
* Special Klee-themed Chinese voice-overs for certain interactions

===Xiaomi Smart Band 8 Pro (Tartaglia)===
This collaboration features a Xiaomi Smart Band 8 Pro with a custom theme centred around [[Tartaglia]]. The device comes in special packaging with the same theming style.
